system.description:
When you demand answers from someone weaker than you, roll +Iron.

This Move cannot be Shared.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value:
You may only ask one question.

One of their answers may be a lie, if they want to lie to you. You will not be told which answer is the lie, or even if there is a lie at all.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
Ask two questions from the list. They must answer honestly.

One of their answers may be a lie, if they want to lie to you. You will not be told which answer is the lie, or even if there is a lie at all.

success.label: Success!
success.value: Ask two questions from the list. They must answer honestly.

system.choices:
• What can you tell me about the fellowship?
  • What are you hiding?
  • Where is ________?
  • No more questions. Deal damage and end the interrogation.
